meanings.sent1: The strewer sprinkled seeds in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The strewer left a trail of breadcrumbs behind.
meanings.sent3: The strewer accidentally spilled glitter all over the floor.
meanings.sent4: The strewer of rumors caused chaos in the community.
meanings.sent5: The strewer of kindness brightened everyone's day.
